subject: Golf
Discrimination
British Open (Golf)
Blacks
lead_paragraph: Powell, who played on the L.P.G.A. Tour from 1967 to 1980, experienced racism and received death threats. Now she’s one of the first female members of the Royal and Ancient Golf Club in Scotland.
snippet: Powell, who played on the L.P.G.A. Tour from 1967 to 1980, experienced racism and received death threats. Now she’s one of the first female members of the Royal and Ancient Golf Club in Scotland.
